settings.name: Column name for street colouring
settings.description: Insert the column name of the input roads data set that you want to use for colouring the roads in the map of intersections.

settings.name: Road files
settings.description: You can upload local files for running the road intersection analysis. Make sure that they overlap with the tracking data set and are in WGS 84 projection! There is a current size limit of 1 GB for the file set. The App requires the following files, named exactly as given: 1. `roads.cpg`, 2. `roads.dbf`, 3. `roads.prj`, 4. `roads.shp`, 5. `roads.shx`. Note that fallback road files are provided, but they span only the Yukon to Yellowstone Region (Y2Y).
